answers.answer: Hi,According to medical science urine odor can indicate diseases like diabetes, diabetic ketoacidosis, B6 supplements, kidney stones and urinary tract infection.I am not aware of the Chinese system of diagnosis based on smell of urine.Take care!

question: There are ancient Chinese practitioners who diagnose internal bodily conditions based on the smell of urine.  Does anyone know of a good book or website that teaches or directly advises what these smells indicate?  I think it's a lost practice and I am very curious to explore.
title: Evaluating Urine Smell
